messages.content: When drying cloths in the sun it takes 3 hours for 6 t-shirts. How long will it take to dry 30 t-shirts?
It will take 30 hours to dry 30 t-shirts.
but drying is a parallel task"
Yes, drying is a parallel task, so the total time it takes to dry 30 t-shirts is 30 hours.
If the drying of 6 t-shirts takes 3 hours, it will take a total of 18 hours to dry 30 t-shirts.
